Description:
Detects juniper BGP missing MD5 digest. Which may be indicative of brute force attacks to manipulate routing.

Author: Tim Brown
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Juniper BGP Missing MD5
Query: sourcetype='juniper-bgp' eql select * from _source_ where ( = ':179' and  = 'missing md5 digest')
